name: PyDPF
short_description:
PyDPF - A Digital Picture Frame Application to be used as MPD client and/or standard DPF that is controlled via a LIRC device i.e. infrared based remote controller.

As user interface for graphical output a Appotech AX206 DPF can be configured, hence this application is designed for embedded linux devices without standard monitor. A virtual QT based DPF e.g. for test purposes is available,too.

PyDPF is running fine on my RasperryPi. Please look at AudiculaPi project (https://sourceforge.net/projects/audiculapi).
summary: A Digital Picture Frame Application written in Python
